this_title: An Animated Dog Reads Berger, Haraway, Kafka
introduction: During the COVID-19 pandemic, 23 million American households adopted pets, reflecting the growing urge for animal companions. The evolving, yet complex bond between humans and animals lies at the core of Artist in Focus Matthew Lax’s AN ANIMATED DOG READS JOHN BERGER, HARAWAY, AND KAFKA which explores the complexities of human-dog relationships through cultural and philosophical lenses.
chinese_title: An Animated Dog Reads Berger, Haraway, Kafka
